From: "Victor Tarver" <vtarver@netenforcers.com>

 <abuse@theplanet.com>
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 30 Nov 2006 20:47:44.0421 (UTC) FILETIME=[C9241550:01C714C0] 

 (multipart/related)
Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
 (multipart/alternative)
MIME element (text/plain)
Dear The Planet.com,  
 
  
 
Please read carefully.   Powersellernyc.com has already been sent a DMCA
Notification via postal mail and should be receiving it shortly.  Thank you. 
 
  
 
  
 
  
 
Victor Tarver 
 
LMS Representative 
 
Net Enforcers Inc. 
 
VTarver@netenforcers.com  
 
compliance.management@netenforcers.com  
 
  
 
The Online Enforcement Specialists...... 
 
Statement of Confidentiality 
 
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are
intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be legally privileged. 
This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended
recipient.  If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction
or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the
intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and delete
this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you. 
 
11/30/2006 
 
7005 1160 0002 6996 0826 
 
VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL 
 
RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED 
 
  
 
Designated Agent 
 
ThePlanet.com Internet Services 
 
ThePlanet.com Internet Services 
 
1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110 
 
Dallas, TX 75207 
 
 
Re:      Unauthorized Use of Clarion's Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials 
 
Dear Designated Agent: 
 
This office is authorized to act on behalf of Clarion in this matter. 
 
This letter is to provide you notice pursuant to 17 U.S.C. § 512 (c)(3)(A) of
unauthorized use of copyrighted material of Clarion Co. of America ("CLARION") (such
copyrighted material is referred to as "CLARION Works") by your client,
powersellernyc.com, at the URL www.powersellernyc.com.   CLARION has a good faith
belief that use of the Infringing Material by your client is not authorized by
CLARION, its agents, or the law.  The information contained in this letter is
accurate, and under the penalty of perjury, Net Enforcers is authorized to act on
behalf of CLARION.     
 
  
 
The specific works, graphics or other material CLARION believes to be infringed or
to be the subject of infringing activity (the "Infringing Material") are copyrighted
images from CLARION's website and CLARION's trademark / service mark.  Specific
violations of copyrighted images by www.powersellernyc.com are listed below this
paragraph.  Specific violations of copyrighted images is attached hereto as Exhibit
A.   
 
  
 
  
 
http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-16994--Clarion-CMD4-Marine-CD-Player-.html 
 
http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-17429--Clarion-APX480M-640W-4-3-2-Channel-Power-Amplifier-.html

 
http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-17537--Clarion-APX280M-2-Channel-Amplifier-.html 
 
  
 
There are various additional locations of infringement on www.powersellernyc.com
website.  The above list is a specific sample of some of these, but all
infringements need to be addressed. 
 
  
 
Therefore, pursuant to the requirements of 17 U.S.C. § 512(c)(1)(C), CLARION hereby
demands that you remove or disable access to the Infringing Material in an
expeditious manner.   
 
  
 
If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers Compliance Management Department
via facsimile to 352-505-0040, or via email to
Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com.  All communication must be in writing.  Net
Enforcers is authorized to handle and resolve this matter with you and has already
been involved with this issue.  Calls directly to CLARION will not be accepted.  If
your designated agent or representative does not respond to this demand as requested
by 5:00 p.m. on 12/12/2006, we will assume that this demand has been rejected and
will proceed accordingly. 
 
  
 
Sincerely, 
 
VCLM Law 
 
  
 
Lance C. Venable 
 
Attorney at Law 
 
  
 
LCV/roc
